column4: Help ; I'm using gnome at the moment and my trash (On the right hand side of my workspaces ) is gone ... Anyone know how to get it back to the bottom right hand side of to the right of the workspaces?
rickclick the pannel and add to pannel , it,s in there somewhere
: yes but I cant get it all the way to the right again.
rickclick the stuff in the way , unlock position,  move them around to make room
